resources.string: Please enter an unique Email and enter a password to create a new account.
Please enter your name, gender and phone number. \nYou can edit these in the app later.
Please enter your home detail. \nYou can edit this in the app later.
Please enter your vehicle detail. \nYou can edit this in the app later.
Enter an Emergency Contact. \nYou can share your live location and Driver Detail when you initiate the SOS action. \nYou can skip this for now and edit it in the app later.

While the idea of a safe way home after celebrating has been around for ages, Aber came about in 2024 with a clear mission: to make getting home after a good night out as simple and safe as ordering a pizza. It all started with a personal experience that highlighted the gap between fun nights and responsible choices. We knew there had to be a better way than relying on shaky judgment or pushing friends into uncomfortable situations. And so, Aber was born – a platform that connects responsible designated drivers with those ready to celebrate without the worry of the drive home. Since then, we\'ve grown from a local solution to a nationwide network, all thanks to the amazing community of drivers and riders who prioritize safety and fun in equal measure. We\'re proud to be more than just an app; we\'re a movement pushing for a world where every celebration ends as happily as it begins.

At Aber, we\'re more than just an app; we\'re a community built on trust and responsibility. We connect neighbors, colleagues, and friends, creating a network of reliable drivers who ensure everyone reaches home safely. By empowering responsible choices, we foster a world where celebration and care go hand-in-hand.

Nguyen Mau Bach - s3926937 
Nguyen Minh Hung - s3924473 
Nguyen Vi Phi Long - s3904632 
Le Tran Minh Trung - s3927071
